Articles.Content:
Hi,

I enjoy making cinemas, however, I have a question: when I switch to different ships using [ and ], it displays whatever camera mode it's in. Can I remove this text to make the cinema look nicer?

Thanks,

Mrred1

No, I don't think so. You could try using / to remove everything off the screen before switching crafts, but I don't think it will recognize [ when the HUD is removed. Worth a shot, but I think you will just need to edit it out after recording. Best of luck!
